properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana ninakuinilia
nafsi yangu. x2
(Wewe ni Mungu wangu;
nakutumaini Mungu usiniache
niaibike). x2
Adui zangu wasifurahi
kwa kunishinda.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Unijulishe njia zako ee Mungu;
unifundishe unayotaka.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Uniongoze kwenye ukweli wako;
kwani wewe ni mwokozi wangu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Na unilinde maisha yangu yote;
usikubali niaibike.
